entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
